Deb, The old model of the 470 is now like hens teeth I doubt very much if =
you will be able to find oneIf I come across one I will let you know. You m=
ay want to ask at your local radio shack if they would call other stores an=
d see if any of them have any in stockI did that and wound up with 8 that p=
romptly got snatched up by new researchers. If you can not get the older 47=
0 maybe you can find the old model 469 which looks exactly like the old 470=
 but the differencebetween the old and new model 469 is that the older mode=
l does not have that annoying clicking. It scans smoothly. I am attaching a=
 pic of the old model 470 make sure you tell the person at RS you want the =
one in the box not the see throughpackage. If you want to check out my box =
site it's http://free-paranormalinvestigating.com/franksboxjoesbox/ Bruce
B=
ruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: debbie@...=
te: Wed, 2 Jan 2008 10:12:08 -0700Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: New files in m=
y Radio Shack Box Folder



Steve (or anyone else who knows about this), 

=

The new 470 is all black and can't be modified as of yet 

Based on your c=
omments about the 12-469, I'm going to pick up a 12-470 later today. I call=
ed our local Radio Shack and the guy insisted that the new 12-470 is exactl=
y the same as the old one, just the case is a different color (grey & black=
). I specifically asked if the electronics were set up the same way and he =
said yes, they're exactly the same. Do you suppose he's right about that? O=
r just doesn't know the product that well?









_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Debbie=
 Tejada


'Once you can accept the universe as matter expanding into nothin=
g that is something, wearing stripes with plaid comes easy. '  ~Albert Eins=
tein

On Jan 1, 2008, at 8:44 PM, Steve Hultay wrote:





There is no puls=
ing on the older style 12-470, just clear communication. My 12-469 is sitti=
ng in the corner and i'll probably never touch it again because that consta=
nt pulse noise is very distracting to get past to hear any audible messages=
. That's just my personal opinion anyway for what it's worth. If you listen=
 to my radio shack files from today you will hear the difference between th=
e two boxes. The sweep between the two are both linear, but one has the pul=
se sound and one is just a clean sweep without the pulse. Ask your local ra=
dio shack if they have any 12-470 older style models, they are gray with a =
white top and also has a built in speaker. The new 470 is all black and can=
't be modified as of yet but i think Mike C. could figure it out if he didn=
't have 500 other projects going at the same time....lol Any questions just=
 shoot me an e-mail and i will help the best i can.-Steve H.--- In EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com, 'babiarz3' <babiarz3@...> wrote:>> > Steve, hope your holi=
days were wonderful. We haven't had the chance to> speak in a few weeks.> W=
hat are the difference in the 469 and the 470 besides 2 channel vs.> 4? You=
 are still choosing one channel and it is still a linear sweep> right? Tech=
nically, what would be the difference in choosing AM on the> 469 and AM on =
the 470? The pulsing sound is absolutely annoying. > > Babs > > > --- In EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com, 'Steve Hultay' <urkel23@> wrote:> >> > > > Had a pre=
tty good session today, i've been pretty blocked with other > > boxes yet i=
 seem to always get great results with the RS 12-470. Some > > really good =
responses to my questions. Hey babs, i think you should > > give the RS box=
 a little time and maybe you will start to get stuff. > > Although i have a=
 12-469 also and it really sux compared to the 12-> > 470. The constant pul=
sing noise in the 469 model just drives me crazy > > enough to not concentr=
ate. Try looking for an older style model of the > > 12-470, that's probabl=
y the best radio i own hands down. Instant > > results always and consisten=
tly. All my boxes work, but they are > > finicky sometimes. No need to comm=
ent to my posted files guys, just > > listen and see if i'm on some sort of=
 a right track with the > > communication.> > > > -Steve H.> >>

nary.aspx?icid=3Dchick_wlhmtextlink1_dec
